list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: raise (one's shoulders) slightly and momentarily to express doubt, ignorance, or indifference.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Jimmy looked inquiringly at Pete, who shrugged his shoulders
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Jimmy nhìn vào Pete, người nhún vai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or instance of shrugging one's shoulders.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she gave him a dismissive shrug
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã cho anh ta một cái nhún nhún

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a woman's close-fitting cardigan or jacket, cut short at the front and back so that only the arms and shoulders are covered.
